alert.note: Alert for Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 2:15AM CST until January 09 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Liberty County in southeastern Texas... * Until 300 AM CST. * At 215 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Dayton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northern Liberty, Dayton, Daisetta, Hardin, Kenefick, Dayton Lakes and Moss Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
